page.title: 16A Conservation Group
page.content: {Operation Groundwork}helped our school to make a garden by pulling out the weeds and planting flowers. They came to see who had the best ideas. { {Steven}won a bird table and a T shirt. They helped us clear out our pond, getting out rubbish and bits of wood which filled a skip up to the top. We made a bonfire with the wood. We got very warm by the fire, but we were all wet and dirty. We planted flowers round as well. We went to a wood to plant acorns by standing on them and making them stick in the ground. In years to come they will grow into big oak trees. We went to the BMX course to plant some flowers. Now it looks better. We have done a lot of things with them. Marc Cameron
